response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. It comes with a unique set of features that promise to enhance your daily experience. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering its value, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $180. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring you're among the first to experience its benefits. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 180}
